select p.id,p.prod_no,p.prod_name,p.unit_price,p.type,v.id vendor_id,v.name vendor_name, c.id category_id,c.name category_name,p.description,p.update_by,p.update_time, u.id category_unit_id,u.unit_name category_unit_name, p.unit_id unit_id,u1.unit_name from t_wms_product p left join t_wms_prod_category c on p.category_id = c.id and c.del_flag='1' left join t_wms_vendor v on p.vendor_id = v.id and v.del_flag='1' left join t_wms_measurement_unit u on u.id = c.unit_id and u.del_flag ='1' left join t_wms_measurement_unit u1 on u1.id = p.unit_id and u1.del_flag ='1' where p.del_flag ='1'
and p.prod_no like concat('%',#{param.prodNo},'%')
and p.prod_name like concat('%',#{param.prodName},'%')
and p.vendor_id = #{param.vendorId}
order by update_time desc, prod_no asc

select p.id prod_id,p.prod_no,p.prod_name,p.type,p.unit_price, v.id vendor_id,v.name vendor_name from t_wms_product p left join t_wms_vendor v on p.vendor_id = v.id and v.del_flag='1' where p.del_flag ='1' and p.prod_no =#{prodNo}
